constraints.definition: FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES auth.sessions(id) ON DELETE CASCADE

FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES auth.sessions(id) ON DELETE CASCADE

FOREIGN KEY (oauth_client_id) REFERENCES auth.oauth_clients(id) ON DELETE CASCADE

FOREIGN KEY (sso_provider_id) REFERENCES auth.sso_providers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (company_code, requested_by_user_id) REFERENCES users(company_code, id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (company_code, target_user_id) REFERENCES users(company_code, id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY ("companyCode", "crewId") REFERENCES crews("companyCode", id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY ("companyCode", "employeeId") REFERENCES employees("companyCode", id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY ("requesterUserId") REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY ("targetUserId") REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY ("companyCode", "jobTypeId") REFERENCES job_types("companyCode", id) ON DELETE RESTRICT
FOREIGN KEY ("companyCode", "shiftId") REFERENCES shifts("companyCode", id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (company_code, schedule_id) REFERENCES schedules(company_code, id) ON DELETE RESTRICT
FOREIGN KEY (id) REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (company_code) REFERENCES companies(company_code) ON DELETE RESTRICT
FOREIGN KEY ("companyCode", "employeeId") REFERENCES employees("companyCode", id) DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED
CHECK ((((role <> 'employee'::user_role) AND ("employeeId" IS NULL)) OR ((role = 'employee'::user_role) AND ("employeeId" IS NOT NULL))))
FOREIGN KEY (upload_id) REFERENCES storage.s3_multipart_uploads(id) ON DELETE CASCADE

auth_linkages.definition: FOREIGN KEY (id) REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
